<h3 id="X36967">X(36967) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: REFLECTIONS-OF-X(13)-IN-(A,B,C) TO PEDAL-OF-X(13)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 5*a^6-2*(b^2+c^2)*a^4-2*(b^4+3*b^2*c^2+c^4)*a^2-(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)+2*sqrt(3)*S*(3*a^4-3*(b^2+c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(36967) = 3*X(13)-4*X(396) = 5*X(13)-4*X(5318) = 7*X(13)-8*X(11542) = 5*X(13)-6*X(16267) = 4*X(13)-5*X(16960) = 2*X(13)-3*X(16962) = 3*X(13)-2*X(36969) = 3*X(15)-2*X(396) = 5*X(15)-2*X(5318) = 7*X(15)-4*X(11542) = 5*X(15)-3*X(16267) = 8*X(15)-5*X(16960) = 4*X(15)-3*X(16962) = 4*X(15)-X(19106) = 3*X(15)-X(36969) = 5*X(396)-3*X(5318) = 7*X(396)-6*X(11542) = 10*X(396)-9*X(16267) = 16*X(396)-15*X(16960) = 8*X(396)-9*X(16962) = 8*X(396)-3*X(19106)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(13)</p>
<p>X(36967) lies on these lines:
{2,10645}, {3,14}, {4,5238}, {5,5352}, {6,3534}, {13,15}, {16,376}, {17,382}, {20,61}, {62,550}, {99,298}, {202,15326}, {203,4302}, {299,11057}, {381,11480}, {395,8703}, {397,15704}, {398,548}, {477,5994}, {511,5473}, {524,35696}, {530,3180}, {533,616}, {541,10657}, {542,6780}, {549,5321}, {599,36329}, {617,2896}, {618,621}, {619,7911}, {623,36770}, {634,22845}, {1080,9749}, {1657,16965}, {2043,3390}, {2044,3389}, {2306,5441}, {2307,4324}, {2777,11243}, {3106,22695}, {3366,18585}, {3367,15765}, {3412,5340}, {3522,5351}, {3524,18581}, {3543,18582}, {3627,16772}, {3628,5349}, {3642,11299}, {3830,16644}, {3845,23302}, {3849,36775}, {3850,10188}, {3972,35932}, {4045,11296}, {4299,7005}, {5054,16967}, {5055,33417}, {5309,19781}, {5334,10304}, {5335,15683}, {5343,15717}, {5362,15678}, {5365,10303}, {5464,7761}, {5469,6109}, {5864,22890}, {5872,36958}, {5890,36981}, {6411,35734}, {6674,33412}, {6778,9117}, {7006,15338}, {7576,11475}, {7782,30472}, {7809,30471}, {7918,11303}, {8739,10295}, {8740,35481}, {9736,20426}, {9761,36330}, {9855,12155}, {10633,35489}, {11001,34754}, {11481,15688}, {11485,15681}, {11486,15689}, {11488,15682}, {11489,19708}, {11543,34200}, {12100,23303}, {12154,35955}, {13350,21156}, {13391,36979}, {14093,16961}, {14145,33960}, {14538,16530}, {15228,33655}, {15690,34755}, {15696,22238}, {15759,33606}, {16163,36209}, {16773,33923}, {18586,35787}, {18587,35786}, {20127,36208}, {20428,36765}, {22489,33560}, {22510,31709}, {22511,30560}, {22739,34374}, {29181,36757}, {30439,36978}, {32459,35304}, {34552,35739}</p>
<p>
X(36967) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (13, 15), (621, 618), (5463, 35931), (6778, 9117), (19106, 13), (22493, 5463), (22695, 3106), (23004, 6109), (25166, 14), (25236, 6780), (36961, 1080), (36968, 6781), (36969, 396)<br>
X(36967) = intersection, other than A,B,C, of conics {{A, B, C, X(18), X(477)}} and {{A, B, C, X(298), X(11537)}}<br>
X(36967) = crosspoint of X(13) and X(33606)<br>
X(36967) = crosssum of X(15) and X(34755)<br>
X(36967) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 36970, 16809), (3, 14, 16242), (6, 3534, 36968), (13, 15, 16962), (13, 16962, 16960), (14, 16242, 18), (15, 19106, 16960), (15, 36969, 396), (376, 10654, 16), (381, 11480, 16241), (381, 16241, 16966), (382, 36836, 17), (396, 36969, 13), (5318, 16267, 13), (6109, 23004, 5469), (10645, 36970, 2), (11480, 19107, 16966), (16241, 19107, 381), (16242, 16964, 14), (16809, 36970, 12817), (16962, 19106, 13)<br>
</p>
